column17:
Zepter PBG-904 Nebulizer Price: Rs.12999

Key Features

  • 440 g Weight
  • Rechargeable Battery
  • Compressor Nebulizer
  • Automatic Shut Off
  • 7 ml Medication Capacity
  • Ergonomic Mouthpiece
The Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer has been engineered to deliver your respiratory medication with ease and efficacy. This Zepter nebulizer is connected by tubing to a compressor unit which causes compressed oxygen to flow at high velocity through your medication turning them into mist-like particles thus enabling you to inhale the appropriate amount of medicine with ease.

Safe and reliable to use the accuracy and effectiveness of this Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer has been clinically validated by EU standards. This nebulizer operates at a sound level under 70 dB making it relatively silent compared to its conventional counterparts. With the effective and superior performance provided by the Zepter PBG-904 your medication is efficiently deposited directly to your bronchioles and lungs in a quick duration of time.

Body

The Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer has been designed to provide optimal comfort and ease-of use. This nebulizer measures 85 x 45 x 180 cm in dimensions and weighs a mere 440 g making it compact and portable. With its lightweight and compact body you can carry the nebulizer with you even if you are travelling.

This nebulizer from Zepter comes with three different parts comprising of the small and portable main unit or compressor unit the medication cup which is integrated in the main unit and the mouthpiece along with additional masks. The medication cup in this Zepter nebulizer is capable of holding 7 ml of medication solution. You can alternately use the mask or mouthpiece as per your convenience. Besides the masks come in both adult and pediatric sizes making the nebulizer suitable for all ages. The ergonomic design of the mouthpiece also gives a comfortable inhalation experience as it is built to aptly fit in your mouth.

In order to drive the nebulization process effectively the main unit supplies compressed oxygen to the medication cup which is then transformed into mist-like particles that can be inhaled by you through the mouthpiece or a mask. Located below the mouthpiece is a simple push button used for powering the nebulizer.

Performance and Features

The Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer operates at a nebulization rate of 0.3 μml per minute thereby providing an optimal flow of the medication. This allows the required amount of your prescribed medication to reach your lungs without any wastage. Equipped with Filters that can be assembled and dismantled easily you can thoroughly clean this nebulizer thus meeting health and hygiene standards. The Filters in this Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer reduce the chance of infection by removing bacteria or harmful substances from polluting the mist-like medication particles delivered to you.

This Zepter compressor nebulizer produces particle sizes that range from 3-4 μm hence making it easy for these particles to infiltrate deep into your lungs resulting in an effective medication delivery. In addition to this the MMAD of the mist-like particle is within respirable range that enables a comfortable and easy inhalation enhancing the efficacy of this nebulizer. The MMAD is the Mass Median Aerodynamic Diameter that is associated with quantifying aerodynamic particle size distribution or the average of the distribution of aerosol mass with respect to aerodynamic diameter.

The Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer operates at a temperature ranging from 10 to 40 degree Celsius. You can store this nebulizer machine at a temperature that ranges from -25 to 60 degree Celsius. This nebulizer runs on a rechargeable battery that requires a power supply of 100-240 V 50-60 Hz. You can also carry this nebulizer while you are travelling as it comes with a 12 V car adaptor allowing you to recharge your battery on the go.

For your comfort and convenience the Zepter PBG-904 nebulizer's Low Battery Indicator alerts you when your battery is low. Additionally the Auto Shut-off featured in this nebulizer enhances its battery life and saves energy as the device automatically shuts down if left idle for a prolonged period.

column17:
Zepter PBG-902 Upper Arm Bp Monitor Price: Rs.5460

Key Features

  • Fuzzy Logic

The Zepter PBG-902 BP monitor provides an ideal solution for keeping you updated on your blood pressure condition on a daily basis. This digital BP monitor delivers quick and precise readings enabling you to measure your blood pressure without the need to visit a clinic. With the fully automatic operation facilitated by this upper arm BP monitor you can get your blood pressure readings with ease and efficacy. Clinically tested and validated for accuracy this Zepter BP monitor is safe and reliable in its usage.

Build

This Zepter PBG-902 BP monitor has been crafted to give you an easy and comfortable measuring experience. The blood pressure monitor has two components comprising of the main unit that also houses the control panel and an easy-to-attach non-integrated cuff. The main unit accommodates a large LCD screen and simple one touch push buttons. Built for easy viewing the LCD screen displays your systolic and diastolic pressure readings along with your pulse rates with enhanced clarity.

Weighing about 450 g and measuring 129 x 133 x 60 mm in dimensions this Zepter BP monitor is lightweight and compact. The compact body of this BP monitor enables you to carry the device even if you are on the go. This digital upper arm BP monitor comes with a comfortable cuff that fits into arm sizes ranging from 22-32 cm in diameter. You can operate this BP monitor with ease and comfort as all you have to do is attach the cuff to your arms and press the one touch button for quick and precise readings.

Performance

The Zepter PBG-902 upper arm BP monitor utilizes the advanced Fuzzy Logic Technology that allows inflation and deflation of the cuff and also enables the monitor to determine the ideal cuff inflation pressure related to your systolic and diastolic pressure and arm size. This increases the speed of measurement and at the same time results in precise and genuine results. The Zepter upper arm BP monitor is capable of displaying a range of 20-300 mmHg for pressure readings and 40-200 beats/minute for pulse readings.

This digital blood pressure monitor by Zepter operates at a temperature ranging from 10 to 40 degree Celsius. Storing this BP monitor is ideal at a temperature range of -10 to 50 degree Celsius. Empowered with memory feature that enables the Zepter PBG-902 to store 42 readings along with date and time you can keep a tab on your blood pressure with ease and convenience.

You can use 4 AA batteries to run this BP monitor and alternately use electricity as its power source. The batteries in this monitor are efficient and durable as it capably lasts for 250 measuring sessions. Additionally the Auto Switch-off function in the Zepter PBG-902 BP monitor enhances your battery life as the device automatically shuts down if left idle for a prolonged period. ( Adaptor to be bought separately) .
